Package com.intellij.openapi.roots

Class ProjectRootManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.util.SimpleModificationTracker
      • com.intellij.openapi.roots.ProjectRootManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModificationTracker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectRootManagerEx

    public abstract class ProjectRootManager
extends SimpleModificationTracker
    Allows to query and modify the list of root files and directories belonging to a project.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.util.ModificationTracker

        EVER_CHANGED, NEVER_CHANGED

      abstract VirtualFile [] getContentRoots()
      Returns the list of content roots for all modules in the project.

      Returns the list of content root URLs for all modules in the project.

      • getInstance

        Parameters:

      • getFileIndex

        public abstract ProjectFileIndex getFileIndex()
        Returns the file index for the project.
        Returns:
        the file index instance.

      • orderEntries

        public abstract OrderEnumerator orderEntries()
        Creates new enumerator instance to process dependencies of all modules in the project. Only first level dependencies of modules are processed so OrderEnumerator.recursively() option is ignored and OrderEnumerator.withoutDepModules() option is forced
        Returns:
        new enumerator instance

      • orderEntries

        public abstract OrderEnumerator orderEntries(java.util.Collection<? extends Module> modules)
        Creates new enumerator instance to process dependencies of several modules in the project. Caching is not supported for this enumerator
        Parameters:
        modules - modules to process
        Returns:
        new enumerator instance

      • getContentRootsFromAllModules

        public abstract VirtualFile [] getContentRootsFromAllModules()
        Unlike getContentRoots(), this includes the project base dir. Is this really necessary? TODO: remove this method?

      • getContentRootUrls

        public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getContentRootUrls()
        Returns the list of content root URLs for all modules in the project.
        Returns:
        the list of content root URLs.

        Returns:
